A1.name: The Founding (Plot A1)
A1.description: 35-storey landmark tower. High controversy due to height and skyline impact.

A2.name: The Workspace (Plot A2)
A2.description: Sustainable workspace with active ground floor retail and community spaces.

K1.name: Zone K1
K1.description: Proposed affordable housing block adjacent to the main dock.

Paper_Yard.name: The Paper Yard
Paper_Yard.description: Modular campus for TEDI-London. A space for innovation and engineering education.
